xmp_property.name: productionNumber
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/productionNumber_description=(*Required) A unique number used to identify an individual Programme Version. Also known as Programme Number, Clock Number or Material ID.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/productionNumber_label=Production Number *

xmp_property.name: synopsis
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/synopsis_description=(*Required) Descriptive summary of the content of no more than 127 characters suitable to be utilised for EPG/billings purposes.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/synopsis_label=Synopsis *

xmp_property.name: originator
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/originator_description=(*Required) Company responsible for creating asset.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/originator_label=Originator *

xmp_property.name: copyrightYear
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/copyrightYear_description=(*Required) Year in which the production was completed.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/copyrightYear_label=Copyright Year *

xmp_property.name: otherIdentifier
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/otherIdentifier_description=A unique code that can be used to identify a piece of content.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/otherIdentifier_label=Other Identifier

xmp_property.name: otherIdentifierType
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/otherIdentifierType_description=Description of other identifier.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/otherIdentifierType_label=Other Identifier Type

xmp_property.name: genre
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/genre_description=A genre categorising the whole asset.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/genre_label=Genre

xmp_property.name: distributor
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/distributor_description=The name of the person or company/companies providing the content.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/distributor_label=Distributor

xmp_property.name: pictureRatio
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/pictureRatio_description=(*Required) This will be used by the broadcaster in addition to the AFD field and the Picture Format to further determine the editorial aspect ratio of the Programme.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/pictureRatio_label=Picture Ratio *

xmp_property.name: threeD
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/threeD_description=(*Required) This will be set if the material is 3D.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/threeD_label=3D *

xmp_property.name: threeDType
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/threeDType_description=This allows the description of the type of 3D being delivered but does not define how the 3D was created, e.g., CGI, shot in 3D, derived from a 2D image etc.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/threeDType_label=3D Type

xmp_property.name: productPlacement
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/productPlacement_description=Editorial content contains any product placement.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/productPlacement_label=Product Placement

xmp_property.name: psePass
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/psePass_description=(*Required) Status of any flashing and pattern analyser test carried out on the material for PSE.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/psePass_label=PSE Pass *

xmp_property.name: pseManufacturer
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/pseManufacturer_description=Product used to carry out the PSE analysis.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/pseManufacturer_label=PSE Manufacturer

xmp_property.name: pseVersion
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/pseVersion_description=Version of algorithm used to carry out the PSE analysis.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/pseVersion_label=PSE Version

xmp_property.name: videoComments
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/videoComments_description=The comments which illustrate the subjective quality and any known artefacts or defects (inc. intentional) within the video content discovered during production / post production / or any subsequent technical QC/Review process.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/videoComments_label=Video Comments

xmp_property.name: secondaryAudioLanguage
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/secondaryAudioLanguage_description=(*Required) Secondary audio language used in the Programme Version.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/secondaryAudioLanguage_label=Secondary Audio Language *

xmp_property.name: tertiaryAudioLanguage
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/tertiaryAudioLanguage_description=(*Required) Tertiary audio language used in the Programme Version.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/tertiaryAudioLanguage_label=Tertiary Audio Language *

xmp_property.name: compliantAudioStandard
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/compliantAudioStandard_description=(*Required) Details of any compliant audio standard used to constrain the dynamic range of the audio tracks during programme production.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/compliantAudioStandard_label=Compliant Audio Standard *

xmp_property.name: audioComments
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/audioComments_description=The comments which illustrate the subjective quality and any known artefacts or defects (inc. intentional) within the audio content discovered during production / post production / or any subsequent technical QC/Review process.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/audioComments_label=Audio Comments

xmp_property.name: lineUpStart
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/lineUpStart_description=Timecode for start of line up test signals.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/lineUpStart_label=Line Up Start

xmp_property.name: identClockStart
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/identClockStart_description=Timecode for start of the initial ident or countdown clock.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/identClockStart_label=Ident Clock Start

xmp_property.name: totalNoOfParts
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/totalNoOfParts_description=The total number of parts contained within the file.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/totalNoOfParts_label=Total No Of Parts

xmp_property.name: programmeDuration
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/programmeDuration_description=Total of all part durations, i.e. sum of all repeated group of part durations.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/programmeDuration_label=Programme Duration

xmp_property.name: audioDescriptionPresent
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/audioDescriptionPresent_description=(*Required) This status is to be set if the delivered programme contains any audio description for the visually impaired.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/audioDescriptionPresent_label=Audio Description Present *

xmp_property.name: audioDescriptionType
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/audioDescriptionType_description=This describes the format of the audio description employed within the delivered programme.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/audioDescriptionType_label=Audio Description Type

xmp_property.name: openCaptionsPresent
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/openCaptionsPresent_description=(*Required) This status is to be set if the delivered programme contains any visible (in vision) subtitling information for the hard of hearing.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/openCaptionsPresent_label=Open Captions Present *

xmp_property.name: opencaptionsType
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/opencaptionsType_description=This describes the editorial description of the in vision subtitling employed within the delivered programme.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/opencaptionsType_label=Open Captions Type

xmp_property.name: openCaptionsLanguage
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/openCaptionsLanguage_description=This describes the primary language of the in vision subtitle data.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/openCaptionsLanguage_label=Open Captions Language

xmp_property.name: signingPresent
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/signingPresent_description=(*Required) This status is to be set if the delivered programme contains any in vision signing for the hard of hearing.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/signingPresent_label=Signing Present *

xmp_property.name: signLanguage
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/signLanguage_description=This describes the primary language of the in vision subtitle data.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/signLanguage_label=Sign Language

xmp_property.name: completionDate
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/completionDate_description=(*Required) Date of completion of the edit prior to delivery of the final programme.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/completionDate_label=Completion Date *

xmp_property.name: TextlessElementsExist
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/TextlessElementsExist_description=(*Required) Status of whether the final delivered programme includes any textless elements.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/TextlessElementsExist_label=Textless Elements Exist *

xmp_property.name: programmeHasText
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/programmeHasText_description=(*Required) Used to identify if the main programme is free of any text (completely clean).
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/programmeHasText_label=Programme Has Text *

xmp_property.name: programmeTextLanguage
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/programmeTextLanguage_description=Primary text language used in the programme version.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/programmeTextLanguage_label=Programme Text Language

xmp_property.name: contactEmail
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/contactEmail_description=(*Required) The email address of the SPOC (Single Point Of Contact) for the use of the recipient regarding any delivery or technical issues encountered with the delivered file.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/contactEmail_label=Contact Email *

xmp_property.name: contactTelephoneNumber
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/as11u/contactTelephoneNumber_description=(*Required) The direct telephone number of the SPOC (Single Point Of Contact) for the use of the recipient regarding any delivery or technical issues encountered with the delivered file.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/as11u/contactTelephoneNumber_label=Contact Telephone Number *
